description: Numbers m such that the resulting number h after iterations of {((((D_1^D_2)^D_3)^D_4)^...)^D_k, where D_k is the k-th digit D of the number r and k is the digit number of the number r in the decimal expansion of r (A055642)} needed to reach a one-digit number starting at r = n is equal to 1 (h = 1).
